author: Rick Stein
method: Simply mix everything together, cover and set aside for 3-4 hours before serving.
ingredients: 225g/8oz each of black and green olives,  4 tbsp extra virgin oil,  3 small sprigs each of fresh thyme, rosemary and oregano,  4 small fresh bay leaves,  1 large clove of garlic, sliced thinly,  2 lemon slices, quartered
